title: Does a concert pianist only collect half his fee when he performs Ravel's Concerto for the Left Hand? - Quora

response.answer_text: I laughed out loud when I heard this question. I guess it depends on what are you considering half of his salary. Half of the salary he would get if he performs the G Major concerto? I’m not too familiar with the work and its difficulty. I haven't looked at too many works for just a single hand, but I’m going to assume that they are easier overall compare to their two-hand counterpart. Correct me if i’m wrong. If that is the case then it’s possible that the pianist will get paid less compare to the amount he would get if he performed a more difficult work.
